Text: I really regretted d/L and wasting a disk on this game. Completely unoriginal, boring, and repetitive. Just fast driving punctuated by cutscenes of big explosions. And to top it off, if you or any other car gets destroyed, they respawn inexplicably and keep racing. Stupid....

Thanx very much Morck22 for your time to upload all this games. And please whoever dosen't like the games please keep it too your self Morck22 is not forcing you to download the games to be thankful that he is uploading the games for us. Once again thank you Morck22.
Thanks a bunch Morck! You the best.
